title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This chart shows the Percentage of newly conducted by capacity in a new installations .
\\n From the chart we see that the US Country was the Solar PV Country in the installations with 45 newly .
The next Country to make the most newly was the Japan Country with 7 newly closely followed by Japan with 7 newly , then Netherlands with 1 newly .
gold: This statistic shows the share of new installed solar PV capacity worldwide in 2018 , by country . In 2018 , new solar PV capacity installations in China accounted for around 45 percent of the world 's total new installed grid-connected PV capacity .
